title: Jingshenbing Mianqian, Gui Dongxi Suan Ge Qiu
alternative_title: Ghosts Are Nothing ; In Front of Mental Illness, Ghosts Are Nothing ; In The Face Of Mental Illness ; In the Face of Mental Illness, Ghosts Are Nothing ; In the Face of Mental Illness, Nothing Matters ; Jingshenbing Mianqian, Gui Dongxi Suan Ge Qiu ; Mentally Ill Immortal ; Nothing Matters ; With Mental Illness I Am Immortal ; Jīngshénbìng Miànqián, Guǐ Dōngxī Suàn Gè Qiú ; 精神病面前，鬼东西算个球
status: Ghosts Are Nothing ; In Front of Mental Illness, Ghosts Are Nothing ; In The Face Of Mental Illness ; In the Face of Mental Illness, Ghosts Are Nothing ; In the Face of Mental Illness, Nothing Matters ; Jingshenbing Mianqian, Gui Dongxi Suan Ge Qiu ; Mentally Ill Immortal ; Nothing Matters ; With Mental Illness I Am Immortal ; Jīngshénbìng Miànqián, Guǐ Dōngxī Suàn Gè Qiú ; 精神病面前，鬼东西算个球
description:
Description :
        Meet Chen Zhuo, the resident troublemaker at Qingshan Psychiatric Hospital. Despite the system's attempts, his quirks remain untouched. The system's response? "I'm here for technical support, not miracles. Your crazy is your own business!" Get ready for a comedic, horror-filled adventure that defies sanity, where even the system can't fix the chaos within Chen Zhuo's mind.
